sentences.english: She filled the tub, put in a few drops of lavender oil, and washed me.
sentences.chinese: 她灌满了浴盆，倒了几滴薰衣草油，为我洗起来。

sentences.english: French Lavender, Lily of the Valley, Oakmoss, Musk.
sentences.chinese: 法国薰衣草，铃兰，橡苔，麝香百合。

sentences.english: They also will make your feet smell like lavender.
sentences.chinese: 并且会让脚丫有薰衣草的气息。

sentences.english: She had the sweet scent of my lavender soap.
sentences.chinese: 她身上还留有我那块薰衣草皂的香甜的味道。

sentences.english: Lavender fragrance, a lighter is rather the role of god.
sentences.chinese: 薰衣草香味较淡，起到的是宁神的作用。

sentences.english: Mary likes to lavender her handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽喜欢用薰衣草薰香她的手帕。

sentences.english: "One-time" curiosity, "bath" towels and baby, and lavender.
sentences.chinese: 一次性浴巾好奇与婴儿洗澡，薰衣草和。

sentences.english: The lavender had not yet bloomed, but roses were in flower;
sentences.chinese: 薰衣草尚未盛开，但玫瑰已然绽放。

sentences.english: I have some lavender, rosemary, and different ferns and mosses at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 我种了薰衣草，迷迭香，几种蕨类植物和苔藓。

sentences.english: The purple blue aspic , often is cannot separate with the romantic love.
sentences.chinese: 紫蓝的薰衣草，往往与浪漫的爱情是分不开的。

sentences.english: Sarah likes to lavender her handkerchief.
sentences.chinese: 赛拉喜欢用薰衣草薰香她的手帕。

sentences.english: Can also tie the bundles of lavender, the card is inserted in the above table.
sentences.chinese: 也可以扎上几束薰衣草，将桌卡插在花束上面。

sentences.english: Lavender oil is anti-fungal and anti-bacterial and will assist in controlling that which desires to create break outs.
sentences.chinese: 薰衣草精油是抗真菌细菌的，将会帮助控制分泌物。

sentences.english: The perfume was made from violet and lavender.
sentences.chinese: 这香水是由紫萝兰和干薰衣草的花制成的。

sentences.english: When they stopped using lavender and tea-tree, the boys’ chests returned to normal.
sentences.chinese: 他们停止解除薰衣草和茶树油后，胸部就返回正常。

sentences.english: Can we plant Lavender at home?etc.
sentences.chinese: 一般家居里能种养薰衣草吗？

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
